sentence: The lawmakers, Representatives Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, were censured for participating in what the party's resolution described as the persecution of ordinary citizens engaged in legitimate political discourse.? In a rambling statement issued Friday evening, Mr. Trump refrained from sharply attacking Mr. Pence.
title: Trump Is Wrong,' Pence Says of False Claim About Overturning Election

sentence: The lawmakers, Representatives Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, were censured for participating in what the party's resolution described as the persecution of ordinary citizens engaged in legitimate political discourse.? sentence: Pence delivered his speech in Florida a couple of hours after the Republican National Committee (RNC) gathered at its winter meeting in Salt Lake City, Utah took the rare step of censuring GOP Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois for their participation in a Democrat-dominated House select committee investigating the attack on the Capitol.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: 2024 Watch: Trump-Pence chasm over Capitol attack widens amid fight for GOP future

sentence: Somebody such as Larry Hogan or Liz Cheney might enter the race and face the same problem.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: Is Mike Pence Preparing a Kamikaze Campaign?

sentence: Repeated attacks by former President Donald Trump as he tries to oust Rep. Liz Cheney from Congress keep fueling massive fundraising by the Republican lawmaker from Wyoming.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Targeted by Trump, Cheney hauls in nearly $3 million the past three months for her re-election run
